articles.author: Tereza Pultarova
articles.title: Milky Way lights up Guiana spaceport in stunning time-lapse video - Livescience.com
articles.description: Magnificent starry sky awaits Europe's new Ariane 6 rocket in French Guiana.
articles.content: The European Space Agency (ESA) recently released a time-lapse video capturing the pristine night sky above Europe's spaceport in Kourou, French Guiana, where preparations are underway for the arriva… [+3244 chars]

articles.author: Brandon Sapienza
articles.title: EU regulators say Pfizer vaccine can be kept in the fridge for longer - Yahoo News
articles.description: On Monday, the European Medicines Agency said that unopened and thawed vials of the Pfizer vaccine can be kept in the fridge for a month. The previous regulation had the vaccine limited to just five days in the cold conditions.
